description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Lentils in Baked Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jacket potato,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Lentils in Baked Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prick each potato with a fork several times. Rub whole potato with a little of the oil and season with salt and pepper. Wrap in foil, place in a baking dish and cook for 3045 minutes (depending on size) or until potato is tender.

Meanwhile, heat remaining oil in a pan over medium heat. Add vegetables and reduce heat to low. Cook for 10 minutes until soft. Stir in curry powder and chilli flakes and stir over heat for 1 minute. Add lentils, tomatoes and 2 cups water. Stir well and cook partly covered for 1520 minutes until thick.

To serve, unwrap potatoes and cut a cross into each, but don’t cut all the way through. With both hands, press near the base of each potato and the top should open out. Spoon lentil mixture into centre.
